root: ^This is the Saccharum’s mercy, you know. That’s the only reason they do this.
^It’s not like this is efficient. It’s not like they have a surplus of this gas.
^It’s not like they want to sit around watching us turn pipes.
^This is what a compassionate execution looks like.
^A little entertainment, a little distilled joy. Is there a better way to go?
^So, enjoy it. This is all for us.
